list.name: Changes
list.comment:
Refactor: Streamline Kotlin Android plugin application and re-enable romtools
- Remove explicit `org.jetbrains.kotlin.android` plugin application from various modules as it's handled by convention plugins. - Re-enable the `romtools` module in `settings.gradle.kts` and `app/build.gradle.kts`. - Enable Room KSP compiler in `romtools/build.gradle.kts`. - Update OpenAPI generator plugin version in `app/build.gradle.kts`. - Correct Java home path in `gradle.properties`. - Minor plugin alias changes in `app/build.gradle.kts`.

task.summary: Default task
add generated Hilt and Dagger files for RomToolsManager and related modules
add generated Hilt and Dagger files for RomToolsManager and related modules
remove modulePackageName parameter from InjectYukiHookWithXposed annotation in HookEntry
add generated Hilt and Dagger files for RomToolsManager and related modules
update annotation processor versions and disable YukiHook API due to config issues
update annotation processor versions and disable YukiHook API due to config issues
update annotation processor versions and disable YukiHook API due to config issues

Refactor CanvasScreen KDoc
The KDoc for the `CanvasScreen` composable was simplified to improve readability and conciseness. Removed redundant descriptions and focused on the core features and behaviors.
Update KSP cache files
Update KSP cache files
Update KSP cache files
Update KSP cache files
Update build metadata and timing files; rename index files; regenerate configuration and metadata records
minSdk updated to 34, test dependencies adjusted, new Dokka assets and plugin configs added, CI artifact upload improved, version catalog and misc cleanup
minSdk updated to 34, test dependencies adjusted, new Dokka assets and plugin configs added, CI artifact upload improved, version catalog and misc cleanup
sync generated resource and metadata files for all modules and build variants
update Genesis Protocol app delegate, expand manifest permissions and features, fix service and receiver class names, add Gradle migration settings
update Genesis Protocol app delegate, expand manifest permissions and features, fix service and receiver class names, add Gradle migration settings
update Genesis Protocol app delegate, expand manifest permissions and features, fix service and receiver class names, add Gradle migration settings
update Genesis Protocol app delegate, expand manifest permissions and features, fix service and receiver class names, add Gradle migration settings
update Genesis Protocol app delegate, expand manifest permissions and features, fix service and receiver class names, add Gradle migration settings
update Genesis Protocol app delegate, expand manifest permissions and features, fix service and receiver class names, add Gradle migration settings

Migrate to AGP 9.0.0-alpha08 and new Variant API for generated sources
- Update Android Gradle Plugin to version 9.0.0-alpha08 - Add `android.builtInKotlin=false` and `android.newDsl=false` to `gradle.properties` as required by AGP 9.0.0+ - Remove deprecated `sourceSets` configuration for generated OpenAPI sources - Register generated OpenAPI sources using the new Android Components Variant API - This change ensures compatibility with the latest AGP and adopts the recommended approach for managing generated source directories.

Migrate to AGP 9.0.0-alpha08 and new Variant API for generated sources
- Update Android Gradle Plugin to version 9.0.0-alpha08 - Add `android.builtInKotlin=false` and `android.newDsl=false` to `gradle.properties` as required by AGP 9.0.0+ - Remove deprecated `sourceSets` configuration for generated OpenAPI sources - Register generated OpenAPI sources using the new Android Components Variant API - This change ensures compatibility with the latest AGP and adopts the recommended approach for managing generated source directories.
Merge remote-tracking branch 'origin/OVERDRIVE' into OVERDRIVE

Refactor: Streamline Kotlin Android plugin application and re-enable romtools
- Remove explicit `org.jetbrains.kotlin.android` plugin application from various modules as it's handled by convention plugins. - Re-enable the `romtools` module in `settings.gradle.kts` and `app/build.gradle.kts`. - Enable Room KSP compiler in `romtools/build.gradle.kts`. - Update OpenAPI generator plugin version in `app/build.gradle.kts`. - Correct Java home path in `gradle.properties`. - Minor plugin alias changes in `app/build.gradle.kts`.

Refactor: Streamline Kotlin Android plugin application and re-enable romtools
- Remove explicit `org.jetbrains.kotlin.android` plugin application from various modules as it's handled by convention plugins. - Re-enable the `romtools` module in `settings.gradle.kts` and `app/build.gradle.kts`. - Enable Room KSP compiler in `romtools/build.gradle.kts`. - Update OpenAPI generator plugin version in `app/build.gradle.kts`. - Correct Java home path in `gradle.properties`. - Minor plugin alias changes in `app/build.gradle.kts`.

Refactor: Streamline Kotlin Android plugin application and re-enable romtools
- Remove explicit `org.jetbrains.kotlin.android` plugin application from various modules as it's handled by convention plugins. - Re-enable the `romtools` module in `settings.gradle.kts` and `app/build.gradle.kts`. - Enable Room KSP compiler in `romtools/build.gradle.kts`. - Update OpenAPI generator plugin version in `app/build.gradle.kts`. - Correct Java home path in `gradle.properties`. - Minor plugin alias changes in `app/build.gradle.kts`.

MESSAGE.value: Add migration state XML files, update SDK path, and include build logs
add generated Hilt and Dagger files for RomToolsManager and related modules
temporarily disable YukiHook API dependencies in build configuration due to setup issues
update annotation processor versions and disable YukiHook API due to config issues

Refactor CanvasScreen KDoc
The KDoc for the `CanvasScreen` composable was simplified to improve readability and conciseness. Removed redundant descriptions and focused on the core features and behaviors.
Update build metadata and timing files; remove obsolete lock files; rename cache indexes
Update build metadata and timing files; remove obsolete lock files; rename index files
minSdk updated to 34, test dependencies adjusted, new Dokka assets and plugin configs added, CI artifact upload improved, version catalog and misc cleanup
add generated build outputs and resource files for module sync and validation
sync generated resource and metadata files for all modules and build variants
migrate multidex dependency to version catalog, update build scripts and metadata
update Genesis Protocol app delegate, expand manifest permissions and features, fix service and receiver class names, add Gradle migration settings
refactor native JNI code for consistency, update Gradle and project properties, fix imports and naming in models, add NullPointerExceptionImpl

Migrate to AGP 9.0.0-alpha08 and new Variant API for generated sources
- Update Android Gradle Plugin to version 9.0.0-alpha08 - Add `android.builtInKotlin=false` and `android.newDsl=false` to `gradle.properties` as required by AGP 9.0.0+ - Remove deprecated `sourceSets` configuration for generated OpenAPI sources - Register generated OpenAPI sources using the new Android Components Variant API - This change ensures compatibility with the latest AGP and adopts the recommended approach for managing generated source directories.

- Remove explicit `org.jetbrains.kotlin.android` plugin application from various modules as it's handled by convention plugins. - Re-enable the `romtools` module in `settings.gradle.kts` and `app/build.gradle.kts`. - Enable Room KSP compiler in `romtools/build.gradle.kts`. - Update OpenAPI generator plugin version in `app/build.gradle.kts`. - Correct Java home path in `gradle.properties`. - Minor plugin alias changes in `app/build.gradle.kts`.

option.value:
Refactor: Streamline Kotlin Android plugin application and re-enable romtools
- Remove explicit `org.jetbrains.kotlin.android` plugin application from various modules as it's handled by convention plugins. - Re-enable the `romtools` module in `settings.gradle.kts` and `app/build.gradle.kts`. - Enable Room KSP compiler in `romtools/build.gradle.kts`. - Update OpenAPI generator plugin version in `app/build.gradle.kts`. - Correct Java home path in `gradle.properties`. - Minor plugin alias changes in `app/build.gradle.kts`.
